projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Organize resources and manage access control by project.
projects.dialogs.create.title: Create Project
projects.dialogs.edit.title: Edit Project
projects.dialogs.archive.title: Archive Project
projects.dialogs.archive.description: Are you sure you want to archive project "{{name}}"? Archived projects will no longer appear in the active list.
projects.dialogs.activate.title: Activate Project
projects.dialogs.activate.description: Are you sure you want to activate project "{{name}}"? Activated projects will appear in the active list again.
projects.dialogs.fields.name.label: Project Name
